selectedVerses.text: Do not be hasty in the laying on of hands, nor take part in the sins of others; keep yourself pure.
The plans of the diligent lead surely to abundance, but everyone who is hasty comes only to poverty.
Whoever is slow to anger has great understanding, but he who has a hasty temper exalts folly.
The heart of the hasty will understand and know, and the tongue of the stammerers will hasten to speak distinctly.
Be not rash with your mouth, nor let your heart be hasty to utter a word before God, for God is in heaven and you are on earth. Therefore let your words be few.
